text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today marks the start of summer<n>camp. I show Sakura
Chiyono O my<n>notes on our agenda and what I want<n>her to
focus on.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Okay, okay... I guess that's summer<n>camp for you—we have
a ton to get<n>through!
choice_data_list: It is a bigger workload. Think you can handle it?
It is a bigger workload. Think you can handle it?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Of course! I trust you and your<n>Trainynotes!
choice_data_list: "Trainy...notes?"

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Yes! Problems I need to work on,<n>techniques I can use to<n>
improve—they're all written here in<n>this notebook.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I'm guessing you read those books<n>you bought and put a
lot of thought<n>into coming up with this regimen.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Which means, all your care and hard<n>work as a trainer is
packed in<n>here—it's your Trainynotes!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Just watch—I'll use our time at camp<n>to improve as much as
I can!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Her eyes light up, burning bright with<n>determination.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Gasp! ...Almost to shore!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Can't stop yet! Ten more sets! "The<n>Chiyo that walks about
finds the<n>starting gate"!

text_block_list.name: Student at Camp A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, don't you think Chiyo seems<n>almost like a different
person since<n>coming here?

text_block_list.name: Student at Camp B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, she's like super into it. We<n>have to train harder too!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... That should beeverything for today!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I feel like everyone was staring at me<n>on the way here...
Was I doing<n>something weird?
choice_data_list: Nope, you were just being yourself.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Oh? Guess there's nothing to worry<n>about then...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Our days of endless training continue,<n>and before we know
it, camp draws to<n>a close.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: R-really?!
choice_data_list:
Yep, your time's definitely improved since the
start of camp.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: 0.1 seconds... Our 0.1 seconds!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
It's not much... almost nothing really,<n>but still! I'm that much
closer to<n>Maruzen now, aren't I?
choice_data_list: You sure are. Do you feel it?
You sure are. Do you feel it?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Yes! Ehehe...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Our summer camp comes to an end.<n>And now...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I didn't know there was a festival<n>going on so close by.
Thanks for<n>bringing me here!
choice_data_list: A little treat for all your hard work.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. Then I'll be sure to make the<n>most of it! Cotton
candy, yo-yo fishing,<n>goldfish scooping, and... Oh!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
This plush doggie, doesn't it kinda<n>remind you of Maruzen?
Like how<n>fluffy it is, and those kind eyes!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
It's so cute! Hey there, little guy, you<n>wanna come home
with me?
choice_data_list: It reminds me of you, actually.
It reminds me of you, actually.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: M-me?! You mean...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Wait, n-n-no! Never mind! Ahaha. Oh,<n>Trainer, you're funny,
you know that?

text_block_list.name: Stall Owner
text_block_list.text:
You two take a liking to that stuffed<n>animal? Then why
don't ya have a go<n>at our katanuki challenge?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Katanuki?

text_block_list.name: Stall Owner
text_block_list.text:
Here's how it works: you take this<n>sheet of candy here,
and using a<n>needle and your fingers, cut out the<n>shape in
the middle!

text_block_list.name: Stall Owner
text_block_list.text:
Make a clean cut, and I'll give ya the<n>doggie as a prize!
How about it? Up<n>for a try?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ooh, I do really like the doggie, but...<n>this looks kind of hard.
choice_data_list: I'll give it a try!
I'll give it a try!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Hm? ...Wait, what?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
All fired up to win Chiyono O her prize,<n>I give the katanuki
challenge a go, only<n>to find it more difficult than I thought...

text_block_list.name: Stall Owner
text_block_list.text: Oof, close but no cigar. How about<n>another go?
choice_data_list: Okay! I'll get it this time!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Wait, um, Trainer? Maybe you should<n>start out away from
the indents!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Looking at your previous tries, slowly<n>chipping away at the
perimeter<n>seemed like the safest option, so...
choice_data_list: Got it! I can always count on you, Chiyo!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
W-what? No, I was just jotting down<n>notes as I watched...
A-anyway,<n>you've got this!

text_block_list.name: Stall Owner
text_block_list.text:
Ohh! We have a winner! And to the<n>victor goes the stuffed
animal!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Y-you're sure I can have it?
choice_data_list: Yep, another reward for your work at camp.
Yep, another reward for your work at camp.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: ...Thank you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! I'll name you Sakura Dogg-O.<n>Woof, woof!
choice_data_list: He really does look like you.
He really does look like you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Y-you're the only one who thinks<n>that!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Ahem! Whether it looks like me or not<n>aside, um... thank you
once again.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Not just for this little guy, but for all of<n>summer camp, and
everything before<n>that too...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Remember what you told me once?<n>That watching me gives
you strength,<n>and seeing me work hard gives you<n>
courage.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I feel the same way. When I see you<n>working hard, it makes
me want to do<n>my best too.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I've found more strength than I ever<n>did alone. I've come
so much farther<n>than I ever could alone.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
So I know that as long as we keep<n>working hard together, I
can get even<n>stronger!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I'll be your source of strength, and<n>you'll be mine.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
And then, even winning the Derby<n>won't just be some
faroff<n>dream—we'll be strong enough to do<n>it for real!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Or, um... th-that's what this little fella<n>thinks, anyway...
choice_data_list: Well, I agree with Dogg-O.
Well, I agree with Dogg-O.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I... I'm going to make my dreams<n>come true! Even if I can't
grow as<n>quick as everyone else, no matter<n>how long it
takes, I swear I will!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: "The late-blooming sakura is still a<n>sakura," am I right?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: As if in agreement, fireworks bloom<n>bright in the night sky.
